metadata.title: CVE-2019-15693 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: TigerVNC version prior to 1.10.1 is vulnerable to heap buffer overflow,which occurs in TightDecoder::FilterGradient. Exploitation of thisvulnerability could potentially result into remote code execution. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: tigervnc package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
